title: old school 70's type
content:
Hello all!  
I few years ago, I made this logo, and now the client wants to do some stuff with the logo. the problem is that I made this a bajillion years ago, and the source files are all but lost. I need to find out, once again what this font is based on, so I can move on with my life. If anyone has any leads (again) please help a brutha out!  
-jadan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091204034856im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/SchlockType_5687.jpg)
author: jadan

comments.content: yes! Thank you so much! You saved my life!

I just helped you to move on with it.

;-)
